item.description: In support of our local cafes, I would like to invite all of you to join me for our first group meeting at the Coffee Tasting Custom House Coffee on 796 Aquidneck Ave. This is a great opportunity for us to sample various coffees from Indonesia to Africa to South and Central America side by side. This event would be a perfect occassion for us to meet up and get to know each other a little better and the best part is that it is free. However they are only having this from 12 - 3 p.m. and would like to hear your suggestions for a good time.
item.name: Newport Winter Festival 2007
